abstract_ssm: Harry Kelber (1914-2013) was a union activist and labor historian known for his critiques of the labor movement's leadership. This collection contains correspondence, pamphlets, flyers, printouts of on-line newsletters, and videotapes and DVDs related to Harry Kelber's work as a labor journalist, labor historian, and advocate of union democracy.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
